body:
### Description

In any frontend project, when `package.json` parsing fail it will throw error, and I never used angularls in my config, I think itis because angularls is the first lsp, please check the video

```
Error executing vim.schedule lua callback: .../.local/share/nvim/lazy/nvim-lspconfig/lsp/angularls.lua:36: Expecte
d object key string but found T_INTEGER at character 5
stack traceback:
        [C]: in function 'decode'
        .../.local/share/nvim/lazy/nvim-lspconfig/lsp/angularls.lua:36: in function 'get_angular_core_version'
        .../.local/share/nvim/lazy/nvim-lspconfig/lsp/angularls.lua:49: in main chunk
        .../Cellar/neovim/0.11.1/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp.lua:401: in function '__index'
        vim/shared.lua: in function 'tbl_get'
        ...zy/mason-lspconfig.nvim/lua/mason-lspconfig/mappings.lua:28: in function 'get_filetype_map'
        ...zy/mason-lspconfig.nvim/lua/mason-lspconfig/mappings.lua:44: in function 'get_mappings'
        ...on-tool-installer.nvim/lua/mason-tool-installer/init.lua:145: in function 'map_name'
        ...on-tool-installer.nvim/lua/mason-tool-installer/init.lua:195: in function 'callback'
        ...l/share/nvim/lazy/mason.nvim/lua/mason-registry/init.lua:153: in function 'refresh'
        ...on-tool-installer.nvim/lua/mason-tool-installer/init.lua:271: in function ''
        vim/_editor.lua: in function ''
        vim/_editor.lua: in function <vim/_editor.lua:0>

```

title: throwing errors when package.json parsing fail
